attributes.action: Appoint David Watts, of Stoke Climsland, as Chancellor of the Exchequer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: David Watts, of Stoke Climsland Post Office and Village Stores, would be an ideal candidate for Chancellor of the Exchequer.  He can count, runs a very popular business, provides a highly valuable public service to our community, and does not believe in deficits.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
